snippet: The new exchanges are flooded with people who are desperate to find affordable coverage.
abstract: Editorial holds that while glitches in new online health care insurance exchanges are frustrating, fact that Web site attracted 8.6 unique visitors in first three days is a welcome sign of overwhelming public interest; expresses optimism that enrollment will continue to grow as mid-December deadline approaches.
lead_paragraph: The new exchanges are flooded with people who are desperate to find affordable coverage.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
